state: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! First of all, you could, like, make an effort to move south. And then, take a trip east. Then, try to go north. Okay, and then, make an effort to head north. And then, head west. With that over with, attempt to move north. That done, go to the east. Then, move north. After that, venture north. Next, try to travel east. Once you get through with that, make an attempt to go east. Then, go south. After that, go to the east. Then, attempt to travel north. That done, retrieve the coin from the floor of the shower. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Bedchamber =- You're not going to believe this, but you've just entered a bedchamber. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Bedchamber =-0/1
